entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 12:00 AM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

Temperature: 5.1°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 53 %

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
